movies.plotSummary: A young Furiosa is taken from the Green Place of Many Mothers and falls into the hands of a Biker Horde.

movies.title: A Quiet Place: Day One
movies.plotSummary: A prequel exploring the origins of the sound-hunting creatures.

movies.title: 28 Years Later
movies.plotSummary: A sequel to the '28 Days Later' franchise set nearly three decades after the initial outbreak.

movies.title: Contagion
movies.plotSummary: Healthcare professionals, government officials and everyday people find themselves in the midst of a pandemic as the CDC works to find a cure.

movies.title: Mad Max: Fury Road
movies.plotSummary: In a post-apocalyptic wasteland, a woman rebels against a tyrannical ruler in search for her homeland with the aid of a group of female prisoners, a psychotic worshiper, and a drifter named Max.

movies.title: The Hunger Games
movies.plotSummary: Katniss Everdeen voluntarily takes her younger sister's place in the Hunger Games: a televised competition in which two teenagers from each of the twelve Districts of Panem are chosen at random to fight to the death.

movies.title: Independence Day
movies.plotSummary: The aliens are coming and their goal is to invade and destroy Earth, but a group of courageous humans led by the U.S. President and a scientist fight back against the invaders.

movies.title: Titanic
movies.plotSummary: A seventeen-year-old aristocrat falls in love with a kind but poor artist aboard the luxurious, ill-fated R.M.S. Titanic.

movies.title: The Matrix
movies.plotSummary: A computer programmer discovers that reality as he knows it is a simulation created by machines, and joins a rebellion to break free.

movies.title: World War Z
movies.plotSummary: Former United Nations employee Gerry Lane traverses the world in a race against time to stop a zombie pandemic that is toppling armies and governments and threatens to destroy humanity itself.

movies.title: Waterworld
movies.plotSummary: In a future where the polar ice caps have melted and most of Earth is underwater, a mutated mariner fights starvation and outlaw 'smokers,' and reluctantly helps a woman and a young girl try to find dry land.

movies.title: Children of Men
movies.plotSummary: In a chaotic world in which women have become somehow infertile, a former activist agrees to help transport a miraculously pregnant woman to a sanctuary at sea.

movies.title: Snowpiercer
movies.plotSummary: In a future where a failed climate-change experiment has killed all life except for the survivors who boarded the Snowpiercer, a train that travels around the globe, a new class system emerges.

movies.title: The Lost Missile
movies.plotSummary: A mysterious missile threatens to destroy Earth as scientists race to stop it.

movies.title: Teenage Caveman
movies.plotSummary: A young caveman challenges his tribe's superstitions in a world that may be post-apocalyptic.

movies.title: On the Beach
movies.plotSummary: Survivors in Australia await the arrival of deadly radiation following a nuclear war.

movies.title: The World, the Flesh and the Devil
movies.plotSummary: Three survivors of a global catastrophe struggle with their relationships and prejudices.

movies.title: Beyond the Time Barrier
movies.plotSummary: A pilot travels to a dystopian future where humanity faces extinction from a deadly plague.

movies.title: Last Woman on Earth
movies.plotSummary: Three survivors of a mysterious catastrophe that wiped out the world's population struggle with their new reality.

movies.title: Battle of the Worlds
movies.plotSummary: A rogue planet threatens Earth, and scientists must find a way to save humanity.

movies.title: The Last War
movies.plotSummary: A Japanese film depicting the potential devastation of a global nuclear war.

movies.title: The Day the Earth Caught Fire
movies.plotSummary: Nuclear tests knock Earth off its axis, causing global climate changes that threaten all life.

movies.title: The Creation of the Humanoids
movies.plotSummary: In a post-nuclear world, humans create humanoid robots, leading to conflicts between the two groups.

movies.title: Panic in year Zero!
movies.plotSummary: A family tries to survive in the aftermath of a nuclear attack on Los Angeles.

movies.title: The Day of the Triffids
movies.plotSummary: A remake of the 1962 film where most of humanity is blinded leaving them vulnerable to carnivorous plants.

movies.title: This Is Not a Test
movies.plotSummary: A group of people at a roadblock face the possibility of imminent nuclear war.
